original_text: Yes, the Lord Almighty has decided what he will do. Nobody can change it. He is ready to show his power. Nobody can stop it. A message about Philistia Yes, the Lord Almighty has decided what he will do. Nobody can change it. He is ready to show his power. Nobody can stop it. A message about Philistia Yes, the Lord Almighty has decided what he will do. Nobody can change it. He is ready to show his power. Nobody can stop it. A message about Philistia Yes, the Lord Almighty has decided what he will do. Nobody can change it. He is ready to show his power. Nobody can stop it.
korean_text: 만군의 여호와께서 경영하셨은즉 누가 능히 그것을 폐하며 그의 손을 펴셨은즉 누가 능히 그것을 돌이키랴

sentences.original_text: Yes, the Lord Almighty has decided what he will do.
sentences.korean_translation: 그래요, 전능하신 주께서 그가 할 일을 결정하셨습니다.

sentences.original_text: He is ready to show his power.
sentences.korean_translation: 그분은 그의 능력을 보여줄 준비가 되어 있습니다.
